statements: DELETE FROM patient_history WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';

DELETE FROM patient_history
WHERE age > 30 AND outcome = 'Recovered';
DELETE FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01' AND gender = 'M';
DELETE FROM patients WHERE city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM patients WHERE city = 'New York' AND age > 30;
DELETE FROM treatments WHERE treatment_date < '2022-01-01' AND treatment_outcome = 'Successful';
DELETE FROM Treatments WHERE treatment_name = 'Physical Therapy';
DELETE FROM Treatments WHERE duration > 30 AND cost >= 1000
DELETE FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis = 'Cancer' AND date_of_visit < '2022-01-01'
